results.title: Send push notifications to .NET MAUI apps using Azure Notification Hubs via a backend service - .NET MAUI

results.title: Turn on OneDrive file activity notifications - SharePoint in Microsoft 365
results.description: Turn on OneDrive file activity notifications By default, users receive notifications about file activity in OneDrive and SharePoint. These notifications appear across apps and devices. For example, the service sends notifications through the Firebase Cloud Messaging service to the Office mobile app for Android or the Apple Push Notification.

results.title: Send push notifications to Android using Azure Notification Hubs and Firebase SDK version 1.0.0-preview1
results.description: Tutorial: Send push notifications to Android devices using Firebase SDK version 1.0.0-preview1 This tutorial shows how to use Azure Notification Hubs and the updated version of the Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) SDK (version 1.0.0-preview1) to send push notifications to an Android application.
